title: Ready to move in .. Cozy home with two bedrooms and one bathroom
posting_body: Home is ready to move in!
Note: you will have to apply first before you can schedule a tour!!
Cozy home with two bedrooms and one bathroom in North and East Richmond.
Freshly interior and exterior paint with hardwood floors and tile floors thought.
Updated kitchen (all new stainless steal appliances), Bathroom and newer light fixtures the living room is quite large.
Step on out into the deck and enjoy your morning coffee, large backyard (with storage Shed) is enough for a family function.
Within walking distance of elementary school, Target and other stores.
Close to the Del Norte Bart station and easy access to the freeway.
months to month lease or more
Owner pays for all utilities (Trash service, water, gas and electric ) and yards maintenance
No smoking or vaping of anykind
